the employee is successfully deleted with the "Message" in response "Entry deleted"
the "employee[0].employee_id" is the same as the one stored in global
a JWT is generated
a request is prepared to retrieve all employees
a GET call is made to retrieve all employees
the status code is 200
it contains key1 "Total Employees" and Key2 "Employees"
a JWT is generated
a request is prepared to get all employee status
a GET call is made to retrieve the status of all employees
it contains the value1 "Employee" and value2 "Worker"

name: Syntax HRMS API Workflow
description: Description: This feature file tests Syntax HRMS API Workflow
